title: does pixel 5 support dual sim standby. the post on support page is little confusing wrt 5g
content:
does pixel 5 support dual sim standby. the post on support page is little confusing wrt 5g connectivity while using dual standby.

I want  use physical sim slot with visible(verizon prepaid) and esim to receive calls and text msgs on my Indian esim.

if you dont support it now. when can I expect the dual sim dual standby support along with 5g on my pixel 5
